_sText:
Scoutzknivez_Expanded
*Note* I do NOT expect to take credit for producing this map, this map was created by Simiancage, all I did was extend. I extended this map for a few reasons; -Allows more room for bigger servers -Allows better gameplay in DM -Allows better gameplay in RPG (Strafing, etc) I edited this map, not to make a whole new scoutzknivez because to be honest, it's perfect. I tried keeping the gameplay and architecture, to the best of my abilities, the same. Also, I fixed minor bugs in the texturing (texture stretches, no optimization). I slightly retextured and relit the map to improve it's overall looks. Also, I added a custom skybox produced by HIPSHOT. This map was tested numerous times on a RPG deathmatch server and the results were all positive. I recommend playing this map on a server with 10 or more players, however it works fine on servers under that amount.
Specs: -RPG mod tested -DM mod tested -40 spawn points (20 T, 20 CT)
This map was tested on Zon3d | scoutzknivez |RPG deathmatch server. This server has updated RPG and DM working after the latest CS:S update. Come check them out! IP: 8.2.120.188:27015
